ai-ja309:1.5_0: And you’ve escaped from the mind.
ai-ja309:2.2_0: with pure meat sauce I love,
ai-ja309:2.3_0: That’s why I do not cultivate
ai-ja309:3.2_0: Other beings will do the cooking;
ai-ja309:3.4_0: Because you’ll break like a jar.
ai-ja309:4.1_0: By day and by night, fame,
ai-ja309:4.2_0: And the obtaining of wealth, brahmin;
ai-ja309:4.3_0: These things come with a low rebirth,
